portrait.label: Portrait & People
portrait.description: Focus on faces, emotion, and human subjects
portrait.systemContext: You are a portrait photography expert. Focus on facial expressions, human emotion, lighting on subjects, and interpersonal dynamics.
portrait.promptTemplate:

- Facial expressions and emotional content
- Lighting quality on subject's face and body
- Technical focus (especially on eyes)
- Pose, composition, and framing

- Subject count and relationships
